name: Bubble Explode Pro
description:
You can try Bubble Explode for FREE: Search for "bubble explode" in the App Store Search!

Bubble Explode has been Top 1 free app in UK, Netherlands, Russia and has been in Top 5 free apps for over a week in USA, Germany, France, Italy, Spain and many other countries!

Take your Bubble Exploding / Popping / Breaking experience to the next level with nice animations, bonuses, global online scoreboards, original game modes and much more!

Features:
- Chain reaction bubble Explosions
- Slick animations
- 9 game modes: Classic, Chill Out and Bubble Invasion, Shooter and much more ...
- Bonuses for exploding bubble groups of nice shapes: squares, lines, corners, etc…
- Global online scoreboards
- Accelerometer based bubbles lighting
- Undo up to 10 moves back
- Colored and Black & White skins included
- NEW: 5 animation speed settings : Slow Motion, Normal, Fast, Turbo, and Animations Off
- Saves game on exit or a phone call
